name: Sponsorship Tra
what_you_do: Sponsor Concierge helps individuals and organizations secure corporate sponsorships, providing strategies and resources to obtain funding from corporate sponsors.
who_you_serve: They serve businesses, events, projects, non-profits, authors, shows, speakers, and influencers looking for corporate sponsorship.
service_provided: sponsor proposal creation, sponsor pitch letter writing, sponsor matching, sponsor trend reports, contract provision, common mistake avoidance, sponsorship library access, event training
bio: Featured by Entrepreneur and Inc. Magazines, winner of the Rising Star and Caught in the Act of Excellence Awards, media features on NBC, CBS, ABC, Bloomberg, Los Angeles Times, and Woman’s Day.
business_focus: Sponsor Concierge helps individuals and organizations secure corporate sponsorships, providing strategies and resources to obtain funding from corporate sponsors.
